member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CONTENT_DESC
member.summary: Describes a video stream for a video processor.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CONTENT_DESC.InputFrameFormat
member.summary: A member of the enumeration that describes how the video stream is interlaced.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CONTENT_DESC.InputFrameRate
member.summary: The frame rate of the input video stream, specified as a structure.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CONTENT_DESC.InputWidth
member.summary: The width of the input frames, in pixels.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CONTENT_DESC.InputHeight
member.summary: The height of the input frames, in pixels.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CONTENT_DESC.OutputFrameRate
member.summary: The frame rate of the output video stream, specified as a structure.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CONTENT_DESC.OutputWidth
member.summary: The width of the output frames, in pixels.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CONTENT_DESC.OutputHeight
member.summary: The height of the output frames, in pixels.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CONTENT_DESC.Usage
member.summary: A member of the enumeration that describes how the video processor will be used. The value indicates the desired trade-off between speed and video quality. The driver uses this flag as a hint when it creates the video processor.
